Realize virtual contents in bits.

Collaborate to make virtual contents.

CONTENTS

Laboratory to make digital NFT contents of virtual avatars with technology.

3D Avatar

Avatar model is made of 3D architecture. VRM model specification is used to make an avatar. Avatar has face shape keys and body bones for motion capture.

NFT

Content is transferred between users by selling and buying and renting. All profit of deal and rent would be shared for content and service maker.

Co-work

Anyone can join to make contents and get rewards. If youâ€™re interested in making contents, contact us. DAO will be used for collaboration.

Services

Laboratory to make online services for virtual contents.

Communication

People can use avatar as another me. People can do video chatting without revealing face and show avatar which mimics human face and body pose.

Social Media

Avatar can be used for social media like twitter. People express face and body motion with avatar.

Creative Work

People can make another image and video with avatar. Only writing some prompts can make a marvelous picture and animation.

Markets

Virtual content can be sold and rent as NFT. People can own virtual content by blockchain technology.

Rent

NFT can be rent to others. User can rend virtual contents for a day in a limited fee. Any rent record would be open.

Buy

People can buy virtual content in opensea or other NFT markets. And also content owner can rend it.

Share

Profit of selling and rending contents would be shared between content owner and servie maker.

Portfolio

Contents, services, and markets portfolio with realbits.

Avatar utility project

Share avatar snapshot in twitter and chat with your avatar.

Avame service project is now under development. When ready, it would be open in service site.

  • Site: TBD
  • Discord: #avame

Discord chatbot project for drawing image

User can draw image with prompt in discord channel with chatbot command /draw.

User can draw image using /prompt command in discord channel with AI technology. AI model was learned with our content images. So the drawing image result is biased to our NFT content model. Discord chatbot service project is now under testing. When ready, it would be open in discord channel. If you want to use, send me request in contact page below.

  • Discord: #prompt

3D avatar character for dull people.

Dulls This project is under development. When ready, it would be open in the opensea market.

Rent avatar market project

Avatar NFT is rented between owner and user.

Rent Avatar Rent avatar market enables users to rent avatar NFT in a short time. User can access utility function in service with the rented avatar content. Avatar NFT owner also can use utility function in service.

  • Discord: #rent-avatar
